title: RIOT
body: RIOT PLS FIX LOL THIS PATCH WONT UPDATE N I HAVE BEEN TRYING ALLD DAY

replies.body: I'd be happy to help, but there really isn't much information to go off of here.  What exactly is happening and when?  Is there an error message?  Is it happening at a specific % during the patcher?  Let me know!
there is already another thread or wateva about this...just look up... Patch: 6.21 Unspecified error has occurred.

Unspecified errors are usually caused by general local issues, like permissions and connection problems. When I ask the %, it's because it helps determine what issue that specific player might be having. 

It's not a widespread issue, but more of a general wear and tear that happens over time and can be fixed. I'm always happy to help, but I need specifics to get there. :)
My brother's lol patched up in 5 minutes n mine is taking a week still nt patched

I always update my patches every Wednesdays...so last week Wednesday i tried to update my lol it was at 33% then suddenly it showed 0 file scanned n popped up this yoke"unspecified error has occurred pls check the logs for more informations" i went on YouTube tried every single thing it still didnt work reinstalled lol 4 GOOD 5 TIMES still didn't work...d funny part is when d unspecified error shows it goes from 33% to 99% n gets stuck there even while i clicked retry or canecl from d error yoke it goes bck from 33% still doesn't works so I'm wait for patch 6.22 to see if it will work pls if u cn help me pls that would b of good help pls

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aAHjc2ZJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T17:38:03.926+0000)
>
> I'd be happy to help, but there really isn't much information to go off of here.  What exactly is happening an when?  Is there an error message?  Is it happening at a specific % during the patcher?  Let me know!

you guys gotta get on the ball, for real for real. it's pretty easy to go onto Google and look for "unspecified error" then set search perimeters to 24 hours past. Seriously Riot, no excuse for this procrastination.
